scripts.dev: open-cli /Applications/MAMP/MAMP.app && wait-on http://localhost:8888 && concurrently "yarn --cwd ./server start" "yarn --cwd ./client start"
scripts.build: cd client && yarn build && cd .. && git add . && git commit -m "Build" && git push
scripts.deploy: ssh root@174.138.4.195 'cd /lyrikalempire && git fetch origin main && git reset --hard origin/main && pm2 restart server'
